derivation: a primitive root; also denominatively (from H1880 (דֶּשֶׁן))
strongs_def: to be fat; transitively, to fatten (or regard as fat); specifically to anoint; figuratively, to satisfy;  to remove (fat) ashes (of sacrifices)
kjv_def: accept, anoint, take away the (receive) ashes (from), make (wax) fat.
